pageContext.claim: “Well, I heard Adam Schiff got four Pinocchios. That's good. He should have gotten them two and a half years ago.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump celebrates the fact the Schiff received Four Pinocchios from The Fact Checker. But this is the first time Schiff has received Four Pinocchios, so it's not clear why Trump thinks "he should have gotten them two and a half years ago." The Fact Checker did not vet as misleading Schiff's comments on the Russia investigation. Left unsaid is that Trump himself has received Four-Pinocchio ratings 167 times, for a total of more than 1,000 Pinocchios. Moreover, there's this database which documents how many times he repeated these false claims.
